Title: Harbinger (1)
Plot: Boyd has to break in a new team member of equal rank, Detective Superintendent Sarah Cavendish, a high-flyer recently grounded by a hushed-up failed operation.After the empty and abandoned car of banker Donald Rees is discovered threee years after he went missing, Boyd decides to take on the case in an effort help the man's family find some closure with their lives.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification.  Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
